Name: oid
Description: row identifier (hidden attribute; must be explicitly selected)

Name: ev_class
Description: the table this rule is for

Name: ev_attr
Description: the column this rule is for (currently, always -1 to indicate the whole table)

Name: ev_type
Description: event type that the rule is for: 1 = select, 2 = update, 3 = insert, 4 = delete

Name: ev_enabled
Description: controls in which session_replication_role modes the rule fires. o = rule fires in "origin" and "local" modes, d = rule is disabled, r = rule fires in "replica" mode, a = rule fires always.

Name: is_instead
Description: true if the rule is an instead rule

Name: ev_qual
Description: expression tree (in the form of a nodetostring() representation) for the rule's qualifying condition

Name: ev_action
Description: query tree (in the form of a nodetostring() representation) for the rule's action
